talk.author: did:plc:lr6pcl47wsyauqiptmv2eics
talk.utter: Not the majority of you! Just the largest minority of you. Turnout was nowhere near 100%.

talk.author: did:plc:nsmai5kqm7tl7t6roprkl3kg
talk.utter: No. A lot of Democrats stayed home. Frankly that still makes them clueless selfish jerks. In a more saintly mood I might see these election abstainers as some sort of victim, but today I only see people who shirked their duty

talk.author: did:plc:lr6pcl47wsyauqiptmv2eics
talk.utter: I agree with you, but, as I've said elsewhere, I have some sympathy with people who've been given a two-horse race between the Moderately Evil Right-Wing Party and the Batshit Crazy Paedophiles-and-Nazi Party and have decided they don't want to partake at all.

talk.author: did:plc:lr6pcl47wsyauqiptmv2eics
talk.utter: I agree with you, but, as I've said elsewhere, I have some sympathy with people who've been given a two-horse race between the Moderately Evil Right-Wing Party and the Batshit Crazy Paedophiles-and-Nazi Party and have decided they don't want to partake at all.

talk.author: did:plc:gddlpk2p27a5e2gdc3kbvuuv
talk.utter: ... and I'm smart enough to know that by "Moderately Evil Right-Wing," you mean the Democrats

talk.author: did:plc:lr6pcl47wsyauqiptmv2eics
talk.utter: Well, obviously. I'll say this for them, though, they aren't the Batshit Crazy Paedophiles-and-Nazis Party.
